resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105364</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105364</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206622</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Battle of Bentonville: Caring for Casualties of the Civil War</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Schlacht von Bentonville: Interessieren 
für Unfall des Bürgerkrieges</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La bataille de Bentonville : Entretenir des 
accidents de la guerre civile</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A batalha de Bentonville: Importar-se com 
víctimas da guerra civil</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La battaglia di Bentonville: Preoccupandosi 
per gli incidenti della guerra civile</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η μάχη Bentonville: Φροντίδα για τα θύματα του
εμφύλιου πολέμου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La batalla de Bentonville: El cuidar para 
las muertes de la guerra civil</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">shows how battlefield medical care developed during the Civil War, particularly in the Union Army.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">zeigt, wie Schlachtfeld medizinische Behandlung 
während des Bürgerkrieges sich entwickelte, besonders in der 
Anschluß-Armee.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">montre comment le champ de bataille soin médical 
s'est développé pendant la guerre civile, en particulier dans 
l'armée des syndicats.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">mostra como o campo de batalha cuidado médico se 
tornou durante a guerra civil, particularmente no exército de união.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">mostra come il campo di battaglia cura medica si 
è sviluppato durante la guerra civile, specialmente nell'esercito del
sindacato.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">επιδεικνύει πώς πεδίο μάχη ιατρική φροντίδα που 
αναπτύσσεται κατά τη διάρκεια του εμφύλιου πολέμου, ιδιαίτερα 
στο στρατό ένωσης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">muestra cómo el campo de batalla asistencia 
médica se convirtió durante la guerra civil, determinado en el 
ejército de unión.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206622</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105364</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/the-battle-of-bentonville-caring-for-casualties-of-the-civil-war</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
